stadium.name: Fletchings Field
stadium.description: Fletchings Field was the first formal Troll Ball stadium in Warden lands. The design balances wood and stone, with arrowhead motifs and banners representing each region under Warden protection. The field includes trees, gully's and other obstacle placements, changed each match by local druids and terrain crafters.

stats.pregame_ritual: Going over the game plan drawn in the dirt with the team captain.
Leading the team in a synchronized chant that slowly gets louder.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Giving the Trollball a heroic backstory before each game.
Headbutting their own team's goal post (gently).
Sticking a specific type of feather in their helmet's plume.
Burying their helmet in the ground and then digging it back up.
Reading their own fortune in a scattering of knuckle bones.
Wearing a specific, garishly colored pair of undergarments.
Always putting on their left gauntlet before their right.

stadium.name: The Unruly Yard
stadium.description: A field in the center of the city's most rebellious district. The stadium is covered in graffiti, the crowd is hostile, and riots are a common post-game (and mid-game) event.

stats.pregame_ritual: Drinking a shot of hot gravy from a dented tin cup.
Arranging their gear in a perfect, aesthetically pleasing spiral.
Testing the heft of their weapon with a series of slow, deliberate swings.
Kissing the Trollball on its stitched 'nose'.
Reviewing hand signals for secret plays.
Refusing to step on any lines on the field before the whistle blows.
Telling a terrible joke to the Trollball to 'loosen it up'.
Dipping their hands in a bucket of ice-cold well water.
Slapping their own helmet until their ears ring.
Singing a sea shanty completely out of tune.
Reciting a short, epic poem about a past victory.

preGame:
# ‚öæ WELCOME TO THE RUBBER MATCH, SPORTS FANS! ‚öæ

Hello, Osterra! You are listening to the sweet, gravelly voice of Nok the Corrupter, bringing you the third installment of this absolute bloodbath we call the Grand Finals! We are back at **Fletchings Field**, where the grass is green, the trees are shifting, and the local druids are currently arguing over which way the terrain should tilt tonight! The series is tied up at one apiece, folks! After that gritty Monteforte victory in the Yard, the momentum has swung like a heavy mace! üå≥

I just saw **Hole Bowerman** over by the end zone‚Äîshe's currently burying her helmet in the dirt like a squirrel with a very metallic nut! Talk about dedication to the craft! Once she digs it back up, she'll be ready to lead Oak & Onslaught back to glory. And look at **Alben Diantha** of the Chaos Creatures! He‚Äôs just finished dunking his hands in a bucket of ice-cold well water. I suppose that‚Äôs one way to keep your grip when the ball is slick with the tears of your enemies! üßä

The popularity of these Oak & Onslaught "heroes" is truly nauseating‚Äîthe stands are packed with Warden fans wearing those ridiculous feathered caps! Meanwhile, the Chaos Creatures have about as many supporters as a demon in a cathedral, but they don't care! They're here for the violence, and so am I! Will **Sir Randy** and his fancy rangers find a way to navigate their own shifting field, or will the Monteforte rebels turn this botanical garden into a graveyard? The open bar is flowing, the blood is pumping, and the whistle is ready to scream! Let‚Äôs get to the action! üî•üèà
postGame:
# üèÜ THE UNDERDOGS BITE BACK IN BREATHTAKING FASHION! üèÜ

Great spirits of the void, what a display! You‚Äôve just witnessed a tactical masterclass in mayhem here at Fletchings Field! The **New Monteforte Chaos Creatures** have stunned the crowd, shutting out Oak & Onslaught with a 2-0 victory to take a 2-1 lead in this Best of Five series! The Warden fans are so silent you could hear a leaf fall‚Äîif the trees weren't currently busy repositioning themselves! üèüÔ∏è

The carnage kicked off early in the Center Field scramble! **Abner Seidel**, clearly tired of the Chaos Creatures' chatter, delivered a tackle to Raouf Dragone that sounded like a dry branch snapping! Raouf was sent straight to the healers before the game even got its legs! It was a beautiful start for the home team, but the Chaos wasn't far behind! üè•

Not to be outdone, **Wolbrom Ariella**‚Äîlikely still humming those out-of-tune sea shanties‚Äîabsolutely demolished Millham Evangeline! The Bardiche-wielder went down hard, proving that even with a fancy weapon, you aren't safe from a well-timed scythe tackle! The intensity was so high I think I saw **Falric** in the stands clutching his heart‚Äîor maybe his coin purse! üí∞

Just as Oak & Onslaught tried to gain some ground, **Tucker Hett** stepped up and leveled Teria Ravo! It was a parade of pain, folks! Teria was looking for a touchdown but found a one-way ticket to the infirmary instead. The medical staff is certainly earning their gold tonight, especially with **Ahron Latashia** working overtime to patch up these supposedly "invincible" Wardens! üöë

Even the Chaos Creatures weren't immune to the brutality! **Wynnie Faina**, with his boots probably still on the wrong feet, managed to catch Gabriele Klehm with a mace tackle that sent her spinning! It was a back-and-forth symphony of shattered shields and bruised egos. My demonic heart was practically bursting with pride at the sheer lack of sportsmanship! üñ§

As we headed into halftime, the score was still knotted at zero, but the injury list was growing faster than a warlock's debt. The shifting terrain of Fletchings Field was making every run look like a drunken stumble. Speaking of drunken stumbles, the open bar has clearly taken its toll on the fans, but the players remained laser-focused on the violence! üç∫

In the second half, the hits just kept coming! **Millham Evangeline** returned to the field only to immediately lay out Alben Diantha! Then **Affra Yanaton** sent Placido Kora to the sidelines with a longsword tackle that would have made **Sir Tanos** proud‚Äîif he wasn't so busy hating letters! It was a masterpiece of attrition! üé®

Then came the turning point! **Mouldon Earl** decided he‚Äôd seen enough of Wynnie Faina‚Äôs fancy footwork and put him in the dirt with a tackle that rattled the scaffolding! With the defense reeling and bodies scattered across the shifting mud, the Chaos Creatures saw their opening. The tension was thicker than a troll's skull! üíÄ

Finally, the moment that silenced the Fletchings faithful! **Boulanger Procto**, fresh off his gear-arranging ritual, found himself in the Home 2-Point zone. He launched the Trollball with the grace of a falling star, and it sailed through the hoop for a massive **2-point Shoot**! The scoreboard lit up, and the Monteforte bench went absolutely wild! üèÄ‚ú®

Oak & Onslaught tried to rally late, with **Hole Bowerman** scooping up the ball in center field, but the Chaos defense was a wall of steel and graffiti! When the final whistle blew, the Chaos Creatures stood victorious, 2-0! The series lead is theirs, and the "heroes" of the Wardens are looking a little less heroic tonight! We head to Game Four with history on the line! This is Nok the Corrupter, wishing you all a very violent evening! ü§ò
